name: Bucket Knight (48toPlay Game Jam)
description:
Bucket Knight a game for the 48 to Play Gam Jam at Monterrey, México.

Theme: Millenial

The Millennial Tree that has sustained the Bucket Kingdom´s life for a thousand years is now in danger, the 1000 Centigrades Army is approaching... Our hero Bucket Knight must defend the kingdom using the Millennial Bucket by throwing the magical water that surrounds the Tree towards the evil 1000 flames.

The game ends when you or The Millennial Tree dies, or if you defeat the 1000 flames.

Attack enemies pressing 'Z', remember to keep you bucket with water.

Team:
Marco Elizondo 
Oscar Alejandro Lopez 
Jorge Merlo Santos
